title: What do Jefferson's descendants think of his statues?
description: CNN's Poppy Harlow talks with Lucian Truscott and Shannon LaNier, descendants of Thomas Jefferson, about what they think of Jefferson's memorial in Washington as calls grow for the removal of monuments and statues of slave owners across the nation.

title: 10 times Dr. Fauci has refuted Trump's statements on coronavirus
description: President Donald Trump and Dr. Anthony Fauci have disagreed publicly during key moments in the coronavirus pandemic response.

title: One area of the US may seal Trump's 2020 fate
description: The path to the White House for Republican presidential candidates almost always goes through the suburbs.

title: Trump and Fauci clash over coronavirus outlook
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci warned Tuesday that Americans shouldn't take comfort in the dropping death rate among coronavirus patients in the US even as President Donald Trump touts the trend as evidence of a successful response to the virus.
